summary:
Ginny: What should we name our children, Harry?
Harry: Idk
Ginny: You’re naming them, Harry. Choose.
Harry: James Sirius...
body:
Ginny: What should we name our children, Harry?

Harry: Idk

Ginny: You’re naming them, Harry. Choose.

Harry: James Sirius Potter

Ginny: Awe that’s so cute, Harry! What about our second son? You’re so good at names, babe.

Harry: um

Harry: Albus Severus Potter?

Ginny:

Ginny:

Ginny: B-But why??

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.description: I'm just a Ravenclaw trying to be a credit to my house, but a certain potions master is determined to not let that happen. I'm also trying to solve the mystery of the cursed vaults and find my lost brother, but no one else needs to know about that! (Stevie Rogers on Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery.)

summary: For future me; when you struggle with motivation for your language, just remember how good it felt when you understood;  “Die...
body:
For future me; when you struggle with motivation for your language, just remember how good it felt when you understood;


“Die Autoschlange bewegte sich, und ein paar Minuten später fuhr Mr Dursley auf den Parkplatz seiner Firma, die Gedanken wieder bei den Bohrern.”


You can learn new things.

summary: The stupidity of the Purity of Heart needed for a Patronus Charm
title: The stupidity of the Purity of Heart needed for a Patronus Charm
body:
Hey everybody, guess what I just noticed. As awesome as the idea of the Patronus Charm is and even though it is one of the most beautiful visual charms (which makes me really like it), the idea of purity of heart needed to preform it, is stupid! More then stupid: JK Rowling contradicts herself in its regard over and over!

Just in case, people do not know (which is very likely as it is a separate wikipedia information and not mentioned in the book, if an unworthy wizard casts the Patronus charm, maggots burst out of the top of his wand and devour him in seconds (as it has happened to Raczidian). And I find this really, really stupid. Because of various reasons.

For one, it is never mentioned in the books! It never happens in the books. After all, if JK really were to fully go through with this Purity of Heart crap, why did Remus not mention it to Harry? Why did he not tell Harry “You cannot be too corrupt in your heart to preform a Patronus or the charm will kill you”? Why did JK never showed it for that matter?

Moreover if this was what happened to dark wizards, how come JK contradicts herself twice? One example is Snape. A dark wizard, who can easily preform magic. Of course the fans and Rowling will now yell “Well, he did love LIly, so he is excused.”

To that I say: How do you explain Umbridge then?! She could cast a Patronus with no difficulty. And mind you, this is the woman that tortured students for punishment on school grounds. She has no love for anybody. And yet she still can do it. Why was she not devoured by maggots?

This just proves the idea of Purity of Heart is stupid in this regard. JK may proclaim Death Eaters cannot cast a patronus to make Snape seem more special, but to that I call bullshit. The only reason she does this, is because she wants to make a clear line between good and evil, when HP is about the fact that everybody is grey.

Everybody has happy memories somehow. Saying certain people cannot produce a Patronus, because they are unworthy or evil is a whole load of bullshit!

blog.name: magicinrussia
blog.title: Magic First
blog.description:
When we were kids, we dreamt about getting a letter from Hogwarts. We grew up, our dream stayed the same, but it became clear: to get to a magical world we have to build our own Hogwarts.
We - our big team - proudly announce: we are making a movie about Russian magicians, who live right now, in the same country and city as us.
But how long will the peace between their world and ours last?.

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them

summary: What are you currently reading? I’m re-reading Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire by J.K. Rowling and The Terranauts by T.C....
caption:
What are you currently reading?

I’m re-reading Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire by J.K. Rowling and The Terranauts by T.C. Boyle. I’ve picked it up when I was in Dublin last week because I thought that the cover looked nice (I’m a bit ashamed to admit it), and it’s quite enjoyable - not as good as HP though :)

trail.content:
What are you currently reading?

I’m re-reading Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire by J.K. Rowling and The Terranauts by T.C. Boyle. I’ve picked it up when I was in Dublin last week because I thought that the cover looked nice (I’m a bit ashamed to admit it), and it’s quite enjoyable - not as good as HP though :)
